quote: Nyeh heh heh heh!
author: Papyrus

quote: Friendship is just a hot person's way of making you their slave.
author: Burgerpants

quote: It is a beautiful day outside. Birds are singing, flowers are blooming.... On days like these, kids like you... should be burning in hell
author: Toby Fox

quote: I can't go to hell. I'm all out of vacation days.
author: Burgerpants

quote: Despite everything, it's still you.
author: Toby Fox

quote: Never interact with attractive people. Unless you're one of them they're just gonna take advantage of you.
author: Burgerpants

quote: You have something called determination. So as long as you hold on, so as long as you do what's in your heart, I believe you can do the right thing.
author: Sans

quote: Lie to yourself all the time. It makes you feel better
author: Burgerpants

quote: Only the fearless may proceed. Brave ones, foolish ones. Both walk not the middle road.
author: Toby Fox

quote: I gave up trying to go back a long time ago. And getting to the surface doesn't really appeal anymore, either, cause even if we do... we'll just end up right back here, without any memory of it, right? To be blunt... It makes it kind of hard to give it my all.
author: Sans

quote: Now your sanity and mine can die together!
author: Undyne

quote: Always wondered why people never use their strongest attack first. What? You think i'm just gonna stand there and take it?
author: Sans

quote: Oh no! You're meeting all my standards.
author: Papyrus

quote: Why do I always get the freaks?
author: Undyne

quote: Endogeny is contented.
author: Chara

quote: What I like about you is that you're passionate! You're analytical! 100 percent at maximum power!
author: Undyne

quote: I'm 19 years old and I've already wasted my entire life
author: Burgerpants

quote: Why is this person trying to sell me something this is a hamburger restaurant I'm just trying to survive!
author: Burgerpants

quote: Our reports showed a massive anomaly in the timespace continuum. Timelines jumping left and right, stopping and starting... Until suddenly, everything ends. Heh heh heh.
author: Sans

quote: Tra la la. I am the riverman. Or am I the riverwoman...? It doesn't really matter.
author: Riverperson

quote: Leg so hot, hot hot leg, leg so hot you can fry an egg
author: Mettaton

quote: Seems like it's the end, huh? We're out of options... But... Let's at least go out with a bang! Right?
author: Alphys

quote: Everyone's always laughing and cracking jokes, trying to forget our modern crisis. Drearyness, crowding, lack of sunlight... I would join them, but I'm just not very funny.
author: Burgerpants

quote: The future is in your hands. Literally.
author: Toby Fox

quote: But nobody came.
author: Toby Fox

quote: In this world, it's kill or be killed.
author: Flowey

quote: Welp, I'm going to Grillby's. Papyrus, do you want anything?
author: Sans

quote: The REAL battle finally begins.
author: Omega Flowey

quote: Hey, don't look so blue, my friend. I think purple is a better look on you! Ahuhuhu!
author: Mettaton

quote: I'd rather be remembered as an idiot than a coward.
author: Papyrus

quote: I can't afford not to care anymore.
author: Frisk

quote: But... It refused.
author: Toby Fox

quote: I don't have time for that!
author: Undyne

quote: You're blue now. That's my attack!
author: Papyrus

quote: Despite everything, it's still you.
author: Toby Fox

quote: The wind is howling. You're filled with determination.
author: Toby Fox
